pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4894: Stop printing requests/responses on MockMvc test failure
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
There is a bug in MockMvc that causes ConcurrentModificationException
when it tries to read the response headers for async requests in
order to print the response.
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: Can you add your comment in this PR to the code here? This is a good example of how convenient annotations can be, but they often beg the question of "Why is this set?" Your comment will be a very useful reminder six months from now when a new developer sees this.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -25,7 +26,7 @@
  * Similar to AbstractOneUiTest, please be judicious about adding helper methods to this class. Any methods added
  * should be applicable to a wide swath of tests, not just a handful.
  */
-@AutoConfigureMockMvc
+@AutoConfigureMockMvc(print = MockMvcPrint.NONE)

commit.message:
DHFPROD-4894: Stop printing requests/responses on MockMvc test failure

There is a bug in MockMvc that causes ConcurrentModificationException
when it tries to read the response headers for async requests in
order to print the response.
